{{- $copyright := site.Params.copyright -}} {{- $contact := site.Params.contact -}} {{- $tmp := "" -}} {{- $collect := slice -}} {{- $tmp = "©" -}} {{- with $copyright.startYear -}} {{$tmp = print $tmp . "-"}} {{- end -}} {{ $tmp = print $tmp (now.Format "2006") -}} {{- $collect = $collect | append $tmp -}} {{- with ($copyright.title | default $contact.title | default site.Params.author.name) -}} {{ $collect = $collect | append . }} {{- end -}} {{- with $contact.tel -}} {{- $telLink := $contact.telLink -}} {{- if $telLink -}} {{$tmp = ( printf `%s` $telLink . ) }} {{- else -}} {{$tmp = . }} {{- end -}} {{- $collect = $collect | append $tmp -}} {{- end -}} {{- $tmp = partialCached "getContactLink.html" . -}} {{- with $tmp -}} {{- $collect = $collect | append $tmp -}} {{- end -}} {{- $collect = delimit $collect ($copyright.divider | default " Â° ") -}}
{{- $collect -}}
